I feel like HentaiCrepes has started a new wave of people leaving very in depth and extensive reviews for porn. Maybe I haven't seen the comment section of many doujins, but it seems to be a group of people following in Crepes's footsteps. Kinda like how people said "Would have been better if the trap fucked the guy" back when FutaKnight wasn't dead.

I also do this because I find that there are artists who further excel in art, paneling, angles, positions etc.... compared to others, and that is what I am trying to do, to tell people what the artists improved in.

@aahegao-kun you have a good point, adding favs is much easier than writing a comment, but to be fair writing expands the reader's expression to a better level, I started writing these comments as a joke but then realize that I can express my thoughts further if I do this, I don't really give a damn If people care or don't care about my opinions on Hentai, I do it because I wanna say something and writing reviews is the closest thing I can think of, I'm just stating what I like and dislike about things, yes people are in the comment section because they've already read it, which is why I am here commenting lol, I am literally saying what I think about hentai whether I was satisfied about what I read or not, If it annoys you then that's your problem you might as well look away, also I "prefer" doing it here, fuck YT I don't wanna become another ValwinMedia.

@Ahegao-kun I completely understand what you mean, but you can just easily avoid our reviews and look at the other comments as you would, we just like to give our opinions on my hentai for a specific genre we like since we specialize In It per say, we've tasted them all and try to conclude which one Is the best, and there are many who have loved my and I imagine my friend HentaiCrepes work quite a bit.

@HentaiCrepes well if someone likes it they could always just, oh I don’t know, use the fav button? Since thats what its for? We don’t need reviews for Hentai... Like if you have a YouTube channel and are reviewing it fine, that way people can find out about certain Hentai but why on here? If people are in the comment section it’s because they’ve already read it so why do we need reviews? I doubt anyone cares /that/ much about opinions on Hentai... I mean you’re free to comment whatever you want but for some reason it just annoys me a little. Maybe i should stop looking to the comments but i like to bc usually they’re funny and like to get /short/ opinions on it. But whatever do what you want, just don’t complain when someone comments about it.

@UnfortunatelyAlive lmao you literally destroyed the purpose of "leaving a comment" if you stick with such a mindset, just as @Tripple-H said, everything should have reviews, it is to show whether someone enjoys the content he/she consumes or not, it is in no way unnecessary and should be done more often the way I see it.
Is this a Kizuna Ai reference?

Lol what's the big deal about a review? Just like with every form of media hentai will also getting reviews from time to time, though the most times the tags are enough to know if you're going to like it or not, it's not unnecessary per se.

Senbazuru-san sure knows how to do traps right, all of his work that includes traps are usually his best. I definitely feel like gorillas could be great fishes if they really tried, it's a shame tho that pelicans will never be humans makes me sad to think we are not bananas, but all and all this doujin was a great addition to my collection 7.5/10
Great work! Whats with all the hentai reviews lately tho? Weird.

This Is quite the great work by Senbazuru-san, his previous works as well as the quite recent Meshimase Danna-sama was a personal favorite of mine, but there were some rough edges in his works mostly In the art style which made me always give a 7/7.5 rating for his works. but this has really turned out to be his best. the art style Is beautiful and has his signature look to It albeit more refined. 

The overall premise was great, the blowjob scene was a bit alright, I wished It was a deep throat. the sex scenes were quite cute and really Immersed me In the story of passing a trap onto heaven. All In all, 8/10.
@HentaiCrepes Beautiful review for this lovely Doujin, I couldn't have reviewed It any better myself, and I have to agree as well that his art style has Improved quite a bit.

This is a massive improvement to Senbazuru's work, the artstyle is starting to excel in a more consistent look, stylistically I wasn't a fan of Senbazuru's previous works and never really went deep into looking through all of them, although I admit I kinda liked his work Meshimase Danna-sama! and would probably have given it a 7 but yeah I wasn't a fan of his artstyle at the time due to how the shape of the head and eyes look, but this project right here really convinced me that I have to give him another chance, sure his style isn't really my cup of tea but there will be a time when I will appreciate his stuff more and more, what I really liked about this one that I didn't see from his previous works is how more aesthetic (especially the hair) it looks and how more revealing the sex scenes are, even sex position-wise it looks better, I feel like Senbazuru improves in every project he makes so I'm keeping an eye out on his works from now on, so I'm giving this an 8/10.
One of my favorite trap artists
